name: IP_FLOW_DATERNG
description: Tracks the dates during which a flowsheet template was used on a given patient stay.

columns.name: INPATIENT_DATA_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the inpatient data store record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: FLOWSHEET_DATE_ID
columns.description: Stores the flowsheet template (FLT) ID related to the first and last instants documented.

columns.name: FLOWSHEET_DATE_ID_DISPLAY_NAME
columns.description: The display name associated with this template.
